root.name: FAST Racing League
root.description: OverviewIn FAST Racing League players are tasked with racing futuristic spacecraft around tracks with a complete disregard for the rules of gravity. The game features up to 4 player split screen, 'many' racing modes, 24 challenges and 'unlockables.'In order to get ahead players will have to match their phase by ensuring their specific vehicle keeps as much as possible to its optimum parts of the track.
